productData.title: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen, 2023) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Midnight Aluminum Case with Midnight Sport Band. Fitness & Sleep Tracker, Crash Detection, Heart Rate Monitor, Retina Display
productData.description: WHY APPLE WATCH SE — All the essentials to help you be motivated and active, keep connected, track your health and stay safe. watchOS 11 brings more intelligence, personalisation and connectivity. With features like Fall Detection and enhanced workout metrics, Apple Watch SE is an incredible value.     STAY CONNECTED — Send a text, take a call, listen to music and podcasts, use Siri or call for help with Emergency SOS. Apple Watch SE (GPS) works with your iPhone or Wi-Fi to keep you connected.
features: Phone is not in working condition
RAM/Storage/IMEI do not match or verification on Rabbit Exchange App fails

adScript.problem: Juggling health, fitness, and staying connected can be overwhelming in today’s fast-paced world. Missing important calls or not tracking your wellness means missed opportunities.
adScript.solution: The Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) puts motivation, wellness tracking, and seamless connectivity right on your wrist, helping you stay on top of your life—all day, every day.
benefits: Track workouts, heart rate, and sleep with ease
Stay connected with calls, texts, and music on the go
Feel protected with Crash and Fall Detection
adScript.callToAction: Upgrade your wrist—get Apple Watch SE now!

voiceover.text: Stay active, connected, and safe—effortlessly.. Juggling health, fitness, and staying connected can be overwhelming in today’s fast-paced world. Missing important calls or not tracking your wellness means missed opportunities.. The Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) puts motivation, wellness tracking, and seamless connectivity right on your wrist, helping you stay on top of your life—all day, every day.. Here's what makes this amazing: Track workouts, heart rate, and sleep with ease, Stay connected with calls, texts, and music on the go, Feel protected with Crash and Fall Detection. Upgrade your wrist—get Apple Watch SE now!
